resource.item: These functions aren't activated in this account.
TO THE COMPLETE HALL OF FAME...
Prometium is the red raw material which can be collected in outer space.
Endurium is the blue raw material which can be collected in outer space.
Terbium is the gold raw material which can be collected in outer space.

You need Xenomit to produce Promerium.

To buy Xenomit at the trading post, just click on the image.

A combination of
Prometid and Duranium
Requires: Xenomit
You already have the max. number of rockets on board!
You already have the max. number of torpedoes on board!
You already have the max. number of mines on board!
You already have the max. number of lasers on board!
You already have the max. number of generators on board!

You already have the max. number of robots on board!

You can only bid on one robot at a time!

Your P.E.T. cannot hold that much fuel.
Warning: 10 is the minimum transferable amount.
An error occurred. Your ship can't have any hit points if it's to be repaired.
You don't have enough Uridium to repair your ship.
You repaired your ship at the jumpgate.

Drone not repaired - not enough Credit
Extra energy for galaxy gates received
Refund of repair costs after Jackpot Battle
You may place a spacecraft in the hangar hall to use the ship.
Your ship must be docked to be able to select one of the halls.

Purchase unsuccessful.
The hangar that is currently activated is empty.
You must first place a ship in the hangar.
You must first acquire a ship and then place it in this hangar.
Place a ship in the hangar hall to be able to use it.
When you place a bid, the Credits are immediately deducted from your account. They will not be refunded.
Your ship has zero hit points. In order to continue your space odyssey, you can either repair it or buy a new one in the hangar.
Not enough ore is available for the refining process.
Not enough raw materials are available for the refining process.
Your ship still has hit points. This free ship may only be bought if your other ship has been destroyed!
There's not enough room on board the new ship for your equipment. Get rid of some of your equipment to buy this ship.

So, you wanna save the universe ... then start out by collecting 20 Prometium - you know, the little red things found floating around on X-1 and X-2. Once you've collected the Prometium, bring it back to the space station to sell.
Show me what you're made of!
Those pesky Streuners keep interfering with our work. Destroy 5 of them and scare them off. Make sure you're carrying enough laser ammo and rockets on board!
Make yourself useful and collect 30 Endurium for me. You'll find the small blue rocks floating around X-1 and X-2. Trust me, it'll be worth your time!

Two days ago, we lost radar contact with the research probe XF3LD in the X-2 sector just seconds after it made first contact with a new race: The Lordakians. We still don't know why they responded so aggressively, but that's beside the point. If you want to help, seek and destroy 10 of those creatures! If you do, I'll give you a good recommendation the next time you're up for promotion.

Deep in space, you'll find large quantities of Terbium: a golden ore which can be found floating around X-3 and X-4. We need these space rocks for research purposes. Power up your ship's engines and bring us 40 Terbium quickly. Keep an eye out for Lordakians and Mordons!

For some time now, the 2RR0D0G-UV3 sector around Planet Terra has been under attack by aliens. Our scouts assume the Mordons are behind these attacks. It's time for us to take action: Destroy 10 Mordons on X-3 or X-4!
Red alert! Devolarians are attacking the colonies in the X-3 sectors. If you're loyal to your company, then help them eliminate this threat. Search out and destroy 3 Devolarians on the X-3 maps.

We haven't heard much from the Sibelons since the last intergalactic war, but now they've started to retaliate. Several motherships are on a path of destruction in sector X-4. Destroy 2 of them. Recruit some help first, or else you won't stand a chance.
Company Wars I: The MMO has crossed the line! (Vengeance)

We've stood by long enough while the MMO stole our valuable resources. And now the Board of Directors has decided to take action. Too bad a company war has already broken out. It should take no time at all for you to complete this task - just don't take it too lightly. Find enemy Vengeance ships and show the MMO what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The EIC has crossed the line! (Vengeance)

We've stood by long enough while EIC stole our valuable resources. And now the Board of Directors has decided to take action. Too bad a company war has already broken out. It should take no time at all for you to complete this task - just don't take it too lightly. Find enemy Vengeance ships and show the EIC what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The VRU has crossed the line! (Vengeance)

We've stood by long enough while VRU stole our valuable resources. And now the Board of Directors has decided to take action. Too bad a company war has already broken out. It should take no time at all for you to complete this task - just don't take it too lightly. Find enemy Vengeance ships and show the VRU what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The MMO has crossed the line! (BigBoy)
Keep up the good work - find enemy BigBoys and show the MMO what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The EIC has crossed the line! (BigBoy)
Keep up the good work - find enemy BigBoys and show the EIC what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The VRU has crossed the line! (BigBoy)
Keep up the good work - find enemy BigBoys and show the VRU what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The MMO has crossed the line! (Goliath)
One last strike - find enemy Goliaths and show the MMO what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The EIC has crossed the line! (Goliath)
One last strike - find the enemy Goliath and show the EIC what what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars I: The VRU has crossed the line! (Goliath)
One last strike - find enemy Goliaths and show the VRU what we think of their constant interferences!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (MMO) (Vengeance)

Somebody at the top seems to have his eye on you. Not all pilots make it this far. If you continue like this, you'll see your career really take off. But before you start dreaming: GET TO WORK and destroy 30 Vengeances!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (EIC) (Vengeance)

Somebody at the top seems to have his eye on you. Not all pilots make it this far. If you continue like this, you'll see your career really take off. But before you start dreaming: GET TO WORK and destroy 30 Vengeances!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (VRU) (Vengeance)

Somebody at the top seems to have his eye on you. Not all pilots make it this far. If you continue like this, you'll see your career really take off. But before you start dreaming: GET TO WORK and destroy 30 Vengeances!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (MMO) (BigBoy)
Stick to your guns! The enemy has already suffered major losses... destroy 20 BigBoys!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (EIC) (BigBoy)
Stick to your guns! The enemy has already suffered major losses... destroy 20 BigBoys!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (VRU) (BigBoy)
Stick to your guns! The enemy has already suffered major losses... destroy 20 BigBoys!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (MMO) (Goliath)
We've pushed back the enemy ... now all you have to do is give it your all. Annihilate 10 Goliaths!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (EIC) (Goliath)
We've pushed back the enemy ... now all you have to do is give it your all. Annihilate 10 Goliaths!
Company Wars II: A question of honor! (VRU) (Goliath)
We've pushed back the enemy ... now all you have to do is give it your all. Annihliate 10 Goliaths!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (MMO) (Vengeance)

Someone in the Board of Directors mentioned your name. Only time will tell if that's a good thing or a bad thing. Multiple attacks by alien races, the reappearance of the ancient Rrodogian race, and new discoveries of subspace fissures and anomalies lead us to believe that something big is on the horizon. The company wars are only the beginning - but in order to find out more, we must end this war. Destroying 150 Vengeances should be enough to start.
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (EIC) (Vengeance)

Someone in the Board of Directors mentioned your name. Only time will tell if that's a good thing or a bad thing. Multiple attacks by alien races, the reappearance of the ancient Rrodogian race, and new discoveries of subspace fissures and anomalies lead us to believe that something big is on the horizon. The company wars are only the beginning - but in order to find out more, we must end this war. Destroying 150 Vengeances should be enough to start.
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (VRU) (Vengeance)

Someone in the Board of Directors mentioned your name. Only time will tell if that's a good thing or a bad thing. Multiple attacks by alien races, the reappearance of the ancient Rrodogian race, and new discoveries of subspace fissures and anomalies lead us to believe that something big is on the horizon. The company wars are only the beginning - but in order to find out more, we must end this war. Destroying 150 Vengeances should be enough to start.
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (MMO) (BigBoy)
The other companies are beginning to show signs of weakness, our strategy seems to be working! Only the BigBoy fleet is still a problem ... if you capture 100 BigBoys, we can breathe easier!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (EIC) (BigBoy)
The other companies are beginning to show signs of weakness, our strategy seems to be working! Only the BigBoy fleet is still a problem ... if you capture 100 BigBoys, we can breathe easier!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (VRU) (BigBoy)
The other companies are beginning to show signs of weakness, our strategy seems to be working! Only the BigBoy fleet is still a problem ... if you capture 100 BigBoys, we can breathe easier!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (MMO) (Goliath)

They definitely didn't see that coming! Thanks to your exceptional performance, we were able to inflict major damage on our enemy. Now all we have to do is deliver the final blow and destroy their Goliath fleet. If you manage to destroy 50 ships, we might just be able to wrap up the war! If you survive, the Board of Directors will contact you. They apparently have some kind of special mission for you. Be patient and wait for them to contact you. Don't try anything stupid... The Board sees everything, and is quite sensitive when it comes to matters of honor. Good luck!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (EIC) (Goliath)

They definitely didn't see that coming! Thanks to your exceptional performance, we were able to inflict major damage on our enemy. Now all we have to do is deliver the final blow and destroy their Goliath fleet. If you manage to destroy 50 ships, we might just be able to wrap up the war! If you survive, the Board of Directors will contact you. They apparently have some kind of special mission for you. Be patient and wait for them to contact you. Don't try anything stupid... The Board sees everything, and is quite sensitive when it comes to matters of honor. Good luck!
Company Wars III: You've come very far... (VRU) (Goliath)

They definitely didn't see that coming! Thanks to your exceptional performance, we were able to inflict major damage on our enemy. Now all we have to do is deliver the final blow and destroy their Goliath fleet. If you manage to destroy 50 ships, we might just be able to wrap up the war! If you survive, the Board of Directors will contact you. They apparently have some kind of special mission for you. Be patient and wait for them to contact you. Don't try anything stupid... The Board sees everything, and is quite sensitive when it comes to matters of honor. Good luck!
We need more Prometium! Much more ... start looking now and collect 40 rocks for us.
If you bring us enough Prometium again, we'll be able to complete the first part of our research. 80 sounds like a lot, but we're in dire need of large quantities.
Show me what you're made of! (2)
There are still way too many Streuners ... they're turning into a real pain. Shoot down another 10 of them.
Show me what you're made of! (3)
The Streuners are getting harder to hold back, but we have to keep trying! Destroy 20 of them to keep them at bay. Lucky for us, they haven't been all that aggressive ... yet.
We still don't have enough. You must collect more Endurium so that we can continue our research. 60 Endurium shouldn't be any problem for you.
Our research finally seems to be paying off. But we still don't have enough Endurium. Get 120 Endurium for us. We're counting on you!
We've analyzed the last pictures taken from our research probe XF3LD. The Lordakians seem to be regrouping. Destroy 20 of them before they cause any further damage to our sectors.
There's no viable explanation, the Lordakians have started attacking our sectors. That's bad news for us. Maybe if we launch a counterattack, things will settle down. Destroy 40 Lordakians.
Terbium has helped speed up our research enormously. However, there are still many mysteries to uncover ... it's a very strange substance. We need more Terbium for research. 80 should be enough.

This new substance seems to be very unstable. For the very first time ever, we were able to briefly create a subspace portal in the lab. If you collect another 160 Terbium, we'll be able to hold open the subspace portal long enough to travel to the other side. Just keep up your guard, you never know what could travel to our side from the other side. I guess, we'll just have to risk it!

Unfortunately our last offensive didn't have much of an effect. It just made the Mordons more aggressive. If they lose another 20 of their battle robots, they might learn to respect us. So do your best!
The Mordons are up to something. We can't afford to stand around and do nothing. One last attack against the Mordons and we'll at least have bought ourselves some time ... destroy 40 Mordons!

It's a complete mystery why the Devolarians decided to start attacking us. They usually stay in their own sectors and fight the Sibelonauts. Just recently they turned their attention to the three companies. Whatever they're up to, we can't let up now. If you take over six of them, their forces will be greatly weakened.

The Devolarians have been weakened, but their fleet seems to be recovering quickly. What could they possibly want from us? They haven't meddled with us for over 200 years. It's up to you to defeat 12 Devolarians!

We can't get the Sibelons under control. Their shields are much too strong for our weapons. We need more samples of the debris ... blast 4 Sibelons into spacedust! Recruit the best pilots you know; you're gonna need all the help you can get.

We're slowly beginning to understand their shield technology. With a bit of luck, we'll be able to use this technology for our own ships. Our lab readings show that the Sibelons have been scanning our space station, concentrating mainly on our labs. The newly discovered substance seems to make them very nervous. Whatever they're planning, they must not succeed! Annihilate 8 Sibelons.

Saimonites: Bounty hunters of the universe. Wherever there's war and money, the Saimonites are bound to be there. They're very aggressive and fast, but then again, so are you. Aren't you? Pulverize 20 Saimonites on the X-3 and X-4 maps!

We simply can't allow the Saimonites to keep getting in our way. You've got to do something! As long as there's no Saimonite mothership on our radar, we can still control the situation. Destroy 40 Saimonites!

Who hired the Saimonites? Someone seems to be very interested in keeping us busy. We'll find out who's behind this, but until then the only thing that will help is to put up a good fight. Destroy 80 Saimonites!
Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 25 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.
Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 50 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.
Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 75 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 200 Prometium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 200 Prometium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 200 Prometium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 220 Endurium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 220 Endurium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 220 Endurium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 240 Terbium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 240 Terbium there in 100 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 240 Terbium there in 100 minutes.
Too many ... there are just too many ... put an end to them all! Annihilate 25 Sibelonites in 20 minutes.
Too many ... there are just too many ... put an end to them all! Annihilate 75 Sibelonites in 60 minutes.
Too many ... there are just too many ... put an end to them all! Annihilate 150 Sibelonites in 100 minutes.
Curses, the Lordakians have summoned their mothership. It's time to destroy 10 Lordakium!
Curses, the Lordakians have summoned their mothership. It's time to destroy 25 Lordakium!
Curses, the Lordakians have summoned their mothership. It's time to destroy 75 Lordakium!
Kristallants ... until now we thought they were a legend. But they're not, they're real! Shoot down 10 Kristallonians.
Kristallants ... until now we thought they were a legend. But they're not, they're real! Shoot down 25 Kristallonians.
Kristallants ... until now we thought they were a legend. But they're not, they're real! Shoot down 75 Kristallonians.
We seem to have hit them hard. The Kristallinians are becoming more and more aggressive. Destroy 500 of them and we'll have won the war against the Kristallants!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 20 EIC Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 20 VRU Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 20 MMO Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 35 EIC Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 35 VRU Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 35 MMO Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 70 EIC Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 70 VRU Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 70 MMO Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
Demonstrate how superior we are in comparison to other companies: Destroy 25 Mordons in 10 minutes. That'll give them something to think about!
Demonstrate how superior we are in comparison to other companies: Destroy 50 Mordons in 20 minutes. That'll give them something to think about!
Demonstrate how superior we are in comparison to other companies: Destroy 150 Mordons in 45 minutes. That'll give them something to think about!
Where did the Streuners in the X-8 sectors come from? It looks like a whole new type of Streuner. Before any more problems arise, destroy 50 Streuners in 20 minutes!
Where did the Streuners in the X-8 sectors come from? It looks like a whole new type of Streuner. Before any more problems arise, destroy 150 Streuners in 40 minutes!
Where did the Streuners in the X-8 sectors come from? It looks like a whole new type of Streuner. Before any more problems arise, destroy 300 Streuners in 80 minutes!
It seems almost impossible, but we've often thought that in the past. Collect 300 Prometium in 10 minutes. We're counting on you!
Kristallants ... until now we thought they were a legend. But they're not, they're real! Shoot down 100 Kristallonians.
Kristallants ... until now we thought they were a legend. But they're not, they're real! Shoot down 150 Kristallonians.
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 100 EIC Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 100 VRU Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 100 MMO Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 150 MMO Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 150 VRU Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
The PvP maps are strategically important to us. We have to gain control of them! Destroy 150 EIC Goliaths on one of the PvP maps!
Where did the Streuners in the X-8 sectors come from? It looks like a whole new type of Streuner. Before any more problems arise, destroy 450 Streuners in 120 minutes!
Where did the Streuners in the X-8 sectors come from? It looks like a whole new type of Streuner. Before any more problems arise, destroy 600 Streuners in 160 minutes!
Too many ... there are just too many ... put an end to them all! Annihilate 225 Sibelonites in 150 minutes!
Too many ... there are just too many ... put an end to them all! Annihilate 300 Sibelonites in 200 minutes!
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 300 Terbium there in 140 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 300 Terbium there in 140 minutes.
We could make good use of the raw materials still floating around enemy territory. Collect 300 Terbium there in 140 minutes.

Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 100 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.
Curses, the Lordakians have summoned their mothership. It's time to destroy 150 Lordakium!
Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 150 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.
Time to take care of the PvP maps! Pulverize 200 Goliaths on 4-4 and pay attention to your time.

Your reputation is in danger. Here's a one-time chance for you to restore honor to your name: Accept this mission and receive a load of extra honor points for every enemy ship or alien you shoot down. The offer expires after you've regained your honor.
Shoot down enemies at will until your honor is no longer in the red.
It starts off rather harmless. Get ready for the winter games where you'll have to complete the special task quickly!
The level of difficulty is mounting.
An achievable task! Get the job done and show us what a real space pilot is.
Easy, but important. Help the company with today's task.
Trouble is brewing in the outer sectors. Please help with today's task.
Know how to navigate through space? Well, you'll need to for today's job!
Be fast, but don't jump the gun.
Somebody's trying to play a trick on us. Take revenge with today's task.
It's cold out there. It's time to heat things up.
Travel to the darkest sectors of space and complete this job!
Things are getting complicated ... Brace yourself for this special winter games task!
Strong enough to take on today's task?
You have your work cut out for you. Do your best to get the job done!
No time for breaks; complete this job today!
You're in demand! Complete today's winter games task - at all costs.
The Winterfest is approaching. Complete today's task - no matter what it takes!
Winter mission (20) - The goal's in sight
Things are getting tougher. Show what you're made of and keep the winter games alive.
Difficult, but do-able: Do your best!
A hairy situation ... today's task will ask everything of you!
Winter mission (23) - The end is nigh
Almost done. Finish the second last task.
Things are gonna get really tough today! Complete the tasks shown on the right. If you complete all 24 winter missions before midnight tonight, you'll receive a special reward!

Greetings Space Pilots,

The entire Bigpoint Team wishes you a happy holiday season filled with peace and happiness.

Season's Greetings!

Greetings Space Pilots,

Here's hoping that next year will be just as successful and prosperous as the last year! The DarkOrbit team thanks you for your loyalty in 2007.

Have a Happy New Year. Here's wishing you all the best in 2008!

Your Bigpoint Team
A special thanks for you! For more info, visit the forum.

%recipename% is no longer available to be assembled. Your resources and collectibles have been refunded:
